This is a puzzle about square dancing. Track the letters each dancer has as the sequence goes on.
You can look up square dancing calls on Taminations. It has a helpful sequencer to visualize a sequence of calls.

The phrase DANCE HEX clues us to look at hexagon square dancing. Taminations has a setting for hexagon dancing by going to settings, and switching the special geometry to hexagon. Note that the Taminations sequencer does not support hex dancing, however.
Read the dancer's letters in order, starting with Boy 1, then Girl 1, then Boy 2, and so on in that order.
